name: @ocd/codegen-cli
title: OKIT Open Cloud Designer Codegen Command-linetop

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run pack
scripts.generate-ocd-build-date: npm run generate-ocd-build-date-desktop && npm run generate-ocd-build-date-export
scripts.generate-oci-terraform-provider-schema: cd schema/oci && terraform init -upgrade && terraform providers schema -json > tf-schema.json
scripts.generate-azurerm-terraform-provider-sche: cd schema/azure && terraform init -upgrade && terraform providers schema -json > tf-schema.json
scripts.generate-google-terraform-provider-schem: cd schema/google && terraform init -upgrade && terraform providers schema -json > tf-schema.json
scripts.generate-aws-terraform-provider-schema: cd schema/aws && terraform init -upgrade && terraform providers schema -json > tf-schema.json
scripts.generate-terraform-provider-schema: npm run generate-oci-terraform-provider-schema && npm run generate-azurerm-terraform-provider-schema && npm run generate-google-terraform-provider-schema && npm run generate-aws-terraform-provider-schema
scripts.import: npm run import-oci-terraform-schema && npm run import-azureaz-terraform-schema && npm run import-azurerm-terraform-schema
scripts.generate-oci: npm run generate-oci-model && npm run generate-oci-markdown && npm run generate-oci-properties && npm run generate-oci-terraform && npm run generate-oci-tabular && npm run generate-oci-validator
scripts.generate-azurerm: npm run generate-azurerm-model && npm run generate-azurerm-markdown && npm run generate-azurerm-properties && npm run generate-azurerm-terraform && npm run generate-azurerm-tabular && npm run generate-azurerm-validator
scripts.generate-google: npm run generate-google-model && npm run generate-google-markdown && npm run generate-google-properties && npm run generate-google-terraform && npm run generate-google-tabular && npm run generate-google-validator
scripts.generate: npm run generate-oci && npm run generate-azurerm && npm run generate-google
scripts.import-and-generate-oci: npm run import-oci-terraform-schema && npm run generate-oci
scripts.import-and-generate-azurerm: npm run import-azurerm-terraform-schema && npm run generate-azurerm
scripts.import-and-generate-google: npm run import-google-terraform-schema && npm run generate-google
scripts.import-and-generate: npm run import-and-generate-oci && npm run import-and-generate-azurerm && npm run import-and-generate-google
